title: Government panel recommends Challa Sreenivasulu Setty as next SBI Chairman
description: "Financial Services Institutions Bureau interfaced with 3 candidates on June 29, 2024 for the position of Chairman in State Bank of India," the panel said in a release.  â€‹The Bureau added that taking performance and experience into consideration, Setty was their choice for the job.
